APSCSCL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 06 Technical Assistant Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 28, 2025, 11:55 IST
 Andhra Pradesh State Civil Supplies Corporation Limited
 6 Jobs |  Posted On : 28-Aug-2025 |  Andhra Pradesh |  Salary : 15,000 to 15,000





The Andhra Pradesh State Civil Supplies Corporation Limited (APSCSCL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 06 Technical Assistant Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree and Diploma can apply for the APSCSCL Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Andhra Pradesh.

APSCSCL Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Technical Assistant	06	Any Degree, Diploma

APSCSCL Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 40 Years.
Age relaxation for SC, ST, BC candidates: 05 Years.

APSCSCL Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the 

Written Test.
Interview.

APSCSCL Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

APSCSCL Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The basic pay: Rs. 15,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the APSCSCL Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the APSCSCL Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form to the mentioned address.
Take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Address:

District Civil Supplies Manager Office, Andhra Pradesh State Civil Supplies Corporation, Limited, D.No 11-09-18, Daspalla layout, Visakhapatnam District.

Important Dates:

Starting date	26-08-2025
Closing date	30-08-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
